Food.name: Quick Kale Pizza
ingredients: 1 tin of chopped tomatoes or 1 tin of tomato passata
Optional: A third of a zucchini and/or fresh mushrooms
method: Step 1: Rinse the Kale and put in a bowl. Drizzle with plenty of olive oil. Press two big garlic cloves or three small ones into the kale. Sprinkle with salt. Massage the olive oil, garlic and salt into the kale.
